products.title: Origin Hybrid Mattress
products.subtitle: Our customers say its too good to be true.
products.short_desc:
LOCKDOWN SALE up to 60% off! Limited Time Only

Ranked #1 in Malaysia, our signature Origin Hybrid Mattress features cooling technology & orthopedic design which gives the right firmness & support to your body. The result is a perfectly cool, comfortable & supportive night's rest. Designed in Germany and proudly made in Malaysia.

reviews.name: Alvin
reviews.desc:
Have been sleeping in mattress for more than a week and it is very comfortable.
